availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry Wendt (Newport, Campbell Co blacksmith and city councilman)

body.p: Newport, Kentucky blacksmith and city councilman. Prussia native. Married Louisa Wendt. Father of Anna Wendt, Emma Wendt, and Edward Wendt.

bibl.p: KYR-0001-029-0586. Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Hamilton County, Cincinnati, Ward 5, p. 418. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, Newport, p. 154. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, Newport, p. 8. “Heinrich ‘Henry’ Wendt (1823-1901),” Find A Grave, memorial no. 107226889, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=107226889&ref=acom (accessed June 1, 2017).
